title: Break a Champion
body:
{{champion:51}} W: gain bonus range and headshot for the duration of the bind. R ignores champions other than the target.
{{champion:103}} R is now on a charge system
{{champion:7}} Clones can dash

EDIT: {{champion:84}} R is now a skill shot.

Think of more :)

replies.body: {{champion:6}}/{{champion:19}}/{{champion:83}}: CertainlyT rework
Because we all know after the rework they are CertainlyTobebroken

Warwick E: Blood Scent [passive]
Reveal all enemies within a 5500 range.

Why have a range?


> [{quoted}](name=5000000000000000,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=PtlkAO1A,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2016-08-08T13:46:44.887+0000)
>
> Warwick E: Blood Scent [passive]
> Reveal all enemies.
Teemo hard countered by turning down volume
Teemo R Passive: Mistery in Death is true sound, meaning it is not reduced by volume.

http://fud.community.services.support.microsoft.com/Fud/FileDownloadHandler.ashx?fid=e4695817-5070-4fd9-8272-365c97f59f06

WHAT THEN?

It still plays.
dun dun dun
{{champion:67}}: Gets her 3 base-AD back

> [{quoted}](name=D3m37r1,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=PtlkAO1A,comment-id=0013,timestamp=2016-08-08T00:45:50.759+0000)
>
> {{champion:67}} 
> R: replaces the player with a potato for the duration

Well at least a potato wouldn't go in for the 1v5 then blame the support
{{champion:34}} remove AOE limit on her R
Anivia gets 6? gg wp
"it's your fault for not winning before 8 minutes"
Please stop you're giving me akali flashbacks.

> [{quoted}](name=ScarletNocturne,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=PtlkAO1A,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-08-07T23:16:43.381+0000)
>
> Anivia gets 6? gg wp

Yeah just sit in fountain and press R

XD
Remove the mana cost limit as well
Nah, just sit in Fountain and wait.
{{champion:8}}  W: Toggle ability

{{champion:10}} 

Gets 1.0 AP ratio on her Q back.

> [{quoted}](name=SithesisLord,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=PtlkAO1A,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2016-08-07T23:52:15.206+0000)
>
> {{champion:10}} 
> 
> Gets 1.0 AP ratio on her Q back.

and +5 AD
Hang on there you madman let's not get too crazy

{{champion:11}}  Q gets 1:1 ap ratio R get full on resets.

:^) good times

1. {{champion:245}} 
Q: Stuns enemy if procs third passive
W: Is completely invis
E: Charge system/gains range with level
R: Resets CDs and Mana
r: also resets helpful debuffs like potions
"helpful debuffs" Sooooooooo, buffs?

{{champion:42}} : W now inflicts both {{champion:68}} and {{champion:201}} ult effects
....wait
{{champion:99}} ult is now an incinerator across the whole map and her q splits into 8 more after every target it hits
Doom bot?

{{champion:77}}
No longer uses mana.
W Instant: ~~Gives a shield~~ Temporarily increases Armor and Magic Resist by 5% bonus HP.
W Passive: Grants a shield for 20/30/40/50/60 +(2 per unit slain).
E Instant: Also breaks any crowd control effects

{{champion:44}} 
All skins no longer wear a shirt.

{{champion:111}} 
R: Targets hit "along the way" are now also stunned for 1/1.5/2 seconds.

{{champion:98}} 
Passive: Players realize all his abilities scale with AP
W: Also grants a shield for 30 / 50 / 70 / 90 / 110 (+ 60% AP)
R Passive: Targets are no longer able to run away from the fight for the duration of the channel.
R Active: Shen teleports to an ally, taking all the damage they receive during the channel.
{{champion:127}} now has a passive ability.

{{champion:6}} 
Q: Now applies on hit effects.
W: Cooldown lowered to 8 seconds at all ranks.
E: Basic attacks gain bonus range to match Q extended range.
R: Cast range tripled.

{{champion:26}} W can be cast on anyone
{{champion:92}} Ult gets the same passive as {{champion:37}} s
{{champion:12}} Passive does quadruple damage to monsters
{{champion:9}} Gets {{champion:28}}s passive
{{champion:39}} E now stuns for the max duration at all levels
{{champion:3}} {{summoner:32}} added to summoners rift
{{champion:105}} manaless
{{champion:74}} no limit on active turrets
{{champion:76}} spear damage and scaling reverted to pre-rework
{{champion:133}} gets the old ult back but retains the new cooldown
{{champion:134}} sheres last for 30 seconds
Teemo's shrooms now CHASE nearby enemies and when they surprise explode you hear his laugh.
{{champion:84}} E procs Q mark.
Vladimir passive stacks with itself.

{{champion:157}} : Windwall also acts as terrain that grounds enemies (pretty much windwall and azir ult at the same time). It disappears only when no projectiles are fired at it after 4 seconds.
{{champion:8}} : Passive stacks with itself.
{{champion:59}} : Ult now grounds enemies, E now also offers reduced damage along with attack speed, Q also has a bleed effect on top of the armor reduction.
{{champion:238}} : Zed can switch places with his shadows indefinitely until they disappear. He can also autoattack with his shadows as well.
{{champion:105}} : 2 passives: His own and Katarina's.
{{champion:14}} : His life does not drain after his passive, E pushes back champions as well.
{{champion:38}} {{champion:7}} : Get their silences back.
{{champion:18}}  Placing Explosive charge (e) on an enemy forces the openent into a 'defuse the bomb' minigame.

{{champion:82}} Q multiplies infinitely

400+1200+2600+....32400+....97200

{{champion:102}} 
Passive: Now doubles ALL armor and mr when in dragon form
Q: Each hit does DOUBLE the amount of your bonus AD
W: Burns targets
E: Scales with AD instead
R: Scales with AD instead and cannot be knocked away when jumping to a target
{{champion:202}} R: Can pass through all enemies
{{champion:45}} Global Ult

{{champion:103}} W actually hits the person you want it to
Edit: and her orb changes colors depending on skin ( you can move the passive indicator off of her orb rito  -.- )
https://cdn.meme.am/instances/57362775.jpg
{{champion:91}} gets his silence again

{{champion:136}} 

Gameplay now matches his lore
{{champion:117}} laugh is global.
{{champion:202}} Fourth auto deals 75% missing health and no crit penalty :D

{{champion:80}} 
Q; Now inflict bleed damage
W: Now scales with AD instead of AP
E: Adds a slow to enemies struck
R: Now transports a single allied champion to the location with you

{{champion:41}} 
Q: Now inflicts TRUE damage
w: Temporarily buff Gp's damage by 50%
e: upon exploding now sprays razorblades outwards inflicting bleed damage
r: Now automaticly fires upon ALL enemy champions upon cast

{{champion:12}} 
Q: Can now crush champions ( Instakill )
w: can now impale targets
E: heals for 75% missing hp
R: 200% damage reduct ( Fuq your damage bruh )

{{champion:31}} 
Q: Now impales enemies and can onehit depending where spikes hit
W: can now destroy enemies hearing thus removing the option of communication with teammates
E: Did I mention I can now impale you from range?
R: Instant kills ( Cmon i AM EATTING YOU afterall )

{{champion:412}} 
Q: can now rip through the flesh of minions to grab champions
w: Enemies can now grab your lantern :^)
E: flay now causes enemies to be knocked down and gives you 2.5 secs to attack them before they regain balance
R: now moves with thresh
